title: "storage media stopped working" after android 11 upgrade
content:
hi, today I updated my pixel 3a to the latest version of android 11 via sideload. During normal use a "storage media stopped working" pop up continues to come out and I cannot access to the internal memory, so I tried to install the latest OTA but unfortunately it gives me this error "
adb: sideload connection failed: closed 
adb: trying pre-KitKat sideload method ... 
adb: pre-KitKat sideload connection failed: closed ". 
what should I do, wait for a new update?
